name: apple
description: A round fruit with red or green skin, often crisp and juicy, commonly eaten fresh or used in various culinary dishes.

name: bus
description: A "bus" typically refers to a large motor vehicle designed for the transportation of passengers, usually along a fixed route with scheduled stops.

name: cow
description: A "cow" is a female adult bovine, which is a domesticated mammal belonging to the species Bos taurus.

name: dog
description: A domesticated carnivorous mammal, known for its loyalty and companionship with humans.

name: elephant
description: A large herbivorous mammal characterized by its long trunk, large ears, and tusks.

name: fountain
description: A "fountain" is a decorative structure that releases water into the air, either in a continuous stream or in patterns.

name: grass
description: Short plants with narrow leaves that cover the ground in lawns and fields.

name: house
description: A "house" is a building or structure that serves as a dwelling for people.

name: ice cream
description: A frozen dessert made from sweetened and flavored cream or milk, often enjoyed in various flavors.

name: jacket
description: A short outer garment worn over other clothing, typically with sleeves and fastened down the front.

name: kite
description: An object, often made of paper or fabric, attached to a string and flown in the air for recreation.

name: library
description: A place where books and other reading materials are stored, organized, and made available for borrowing or reading.

name: mailbox
description: A container for receiving mail, usually found outside homes or in public spaces.

name: nurse
description: A trained healthcare professional responsible for providing medical care, assistance, and support to patients.

name: owl
description: A nocturnal bird of prey known for its distinct facial features, often associated with wisdom.

name: penguin
description: A flightless bird that is known for its distinctive black and white plumage and is often found in cold climates.

name: queen
description: A female ruler who holds a position of royalty and leadership.

name: rainbow
description: An optical and meteorological phenomenon characterized by a spectrum of light appearing in the sky after rainfall.

name: shop
description: A "shop" is a commercial establishment or retail business where goods or services are offered for sale to consumers.

name: tree
description: A perennial plant with a single main stem or trunk, supporting branches and leaves.

name: uniform
description: Special clothing worn by members of a group or organization to identify and distinguish them.

name: vegetable
description: A plant or part of a plant consumed as food, typically savory and nutritious.

name: water
description: A clear, odorless, and tasteless liquid essential for life, widely used for hydration.

name: xylophone
description: A musical instrument consisting of a series of wooden bars struck by mallets to produce musical tones.

name: yogurt
description: A dairy product created by fermenting milk with bacteria, often served as a nutritious and delicious food.

name: zoo
description: A facility where live animals are exhibited, allowing visitors to observe and learn about various species.
